settings.title: Rye July
settings.content: Rye July is a month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

settings.title: What is Rye July?
settings.content:
As part of our commitment to the local community, we’ve partnered with incredible folk to help them work towards what they believe in.

For every online purchase via our webstore, we will donate 2.5% of the net profit to a partner organisation of your choice.

Meet some of our partners.

settings.title: Go Dry This Rye July
settings.content:
Common Ground work tirelessly to strengthen First Nations cultures and to challenge systems of power so that First Nations people can have control over their futures. They are a First Nations-led not-for-profit who amplify First Nations voices, knowledge and stories; campaign to make changes in the education and justice systems; and develop new ways of celebrating and strengthening culture so it can be shared with future generations.

Learn more here.

settings.title: Win the Ultimate Melbourne Whiskey Weekend
settings.content:
The SmartMeals program, run by homelessness charity StreetSmart, provides nutritious, ready-made meals for vulnerable people at risk of or experiencing homelessness. The program also funds food based social enterprises that are providing training and job skills to their vulnerable staff. We are proud to partner with SmartMeals to help them take action against hunger and provide opportunities.

Learn more here.

settings.title: A Missing Ingredient
settings.content:
WIRE is a free information, support and referral service dedicated to supporting women, non-binary, and gender-diverse people across Victoria, working towards equality since 1983 centering the voices and stories of people in the community they support. WIRE assists with matters as wide reaching as gender equity, family violence, social isolation, employment, economic insecurity and homelessness.

Learn more here.

settings.title: Rye July Events
settings.html:
Join us throughout the month of July and help us celebrate the hardy and determined rye grain.

-- 1 July – Rye July Launch party at Rooftop Bar, Melbourne – TBC
-- 2 July – Distillery Open Day 12pm-6pm 1 hour distillery tours (+ 3 July if Saturday sells out)
-- 6 July – Responsible Rye Non-Alc Whiskey Launch, National (available via our website with national ranging in Coles TBC)
-- 8 July – Broadsheet Xmas in July (internal event only)
-- 8 July – Responsible Rye Launch Party at Brunswick Aces – Date TBC with Co-Founder Ben Bowles
-- 9 July – JazzLab Masterclass – TBC
-- 11 July – Stomping Ground Dinner (rye & truffle dinner with beer and whiskey pairings, beer and whiskey cocktails)
-- 13 July – Sydney event, Sydney (Aria Restaurant) – TBC
-- 14 July – Sydney venue activation, Sydney (Bar Planet) – TBC
-- 15 & 16 July – Whisky Live, Sydney
-- 15 July – Wolf of the Willows – brewery tour masterclass with Co-Founder Andrew Fitzgerald
-- 16 July – 10 Saints Bar & Beer Garden 630pm-8pm tasting with matching snacks and masterclass by Co-Founder Andrew Fitzgerald
-- 17 July – Poor Tom’s Gin Whiskey Hall, Sydney – joint masterclass with gin and whiskey cocktails
-- 21 July – Inner North Brewing Co – boilermaker night
-- 22 July – Blackhearts & Sparrows Store Tasting, Geelong
-- 22 July – 18th Amendment bar shout, Geelong – TBC
-- 24 July – Sleepy’s – guest chef pop-up with multiple course dinner paired with The Gospel drinks
-- 27 July – Pinot Noir Vermouth Launch, National (available via our website)
-- 27 July – Pinot Noir Vermouth Launch Party at Noisy Ritual - date TBC
-- 31 July – Co-Conspirators Boilermaker Event, Melbourne
